scripts.ink: inklecate -o data/story.ink.json data/story.ink && node build-scripts/cleanJson.js data/story.ink.json
scripts.build:empty: pug -P -o dist -b src src/index.pug && node build-scripts/makeEmptyEditor.js dist/index.html dist/index.html
scripts.dist-doc: mkdir -p dist/docs && cp -R docs/* dist/docs && mv dist/docs/_config.yml dist/_config.yml
